scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && echo 'Done.'
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --fix && node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
scripts.custom-tests: echo "(No other custom tests yet.)" && echo
scripts.deploy: res=`curl -sL -w "%{http_code}\n" "https://www.iochain.co/global/hasActiveBatchJob/" -o /dev/null` && if test "$res" = "200" ; then npm test && npm run hard-deploy ; else echo 'has active jobs.. stopping'; fi
scripts.force-deploy: res=`curl -sL -w "%{http_code}\n" "https://www.iochain.co/global/hasActiveBatchJob/" -o /dev/null` && if test "$res" = "200" ; then npm test && npm run hard-deploy ; else echo 'has active jobs.. stopping'; fi
scripts.soft-deploy: openode sync && openode cmd "npm install" && openode cmd "pm2 reload all"
